name: GayComChat
short_description: GayComm Messenger is a client that provides access to the Gay.com Messenger (VolanoChat(tm)) network without requiring the use of Java(tm) and the proprietary Gay.com Messenger. GayComm Messenger is GPL and is intended to run cross-platform.
